mapper.select: SELECT attraction_id as id, sido_code as sidoCode, gugun_code as gugunCode, category_code as categoryCode, title, addr, img, hit, recommend, latitude, longitude, attr_type as attrType FROM attraction WHERE attraction_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into attraction (attraction_id, attr_type, latitude, longitude, img, hit, recommend, addr, title) values (#{id}, 'KAKAO', #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{img}, #{hit}, #{recommend}, #{addr}, #{title})
